name: Thapster TV
summary:
An updated version of a rhythm game originally released in Thailand on iOS in 2013 and Android in 2014.
The game is currently available on the PlayStation Store and the Microsoft Store.

The game uses touch controls to hit keys coming towards the screen across 3 tracks on basic up to 5 tracks on expert, while the PS4/XB1 version uses button controls across 6 tracks.
There are now music videos playing in the background and it also has a 360 video mode. The PS4/XB1 version includes a story mode and over 10 original songs.
